definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fly swiftly, dart through the air (cf. perhaps Ar. da0’da0’a run vehemently (of camel))—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִדְאֶה]] De 28:49 + 2 t.; [[וַיֵּ֫דֶא]] Ps 18:11(> ‖ 2Sa 22:11 [[וַיֵּרָא]]); fly swiftly, dart, of eagle De 28:49, in simile of swift army; of Chaldaeans camp. with eagle, in judgment against Moab & Edom Je 48:40, Je 49:22 (in both ‖[[פרשׂ כנפיו]]); of ´[[י]] in theoph. Ps 18:11 (cf. 2Sa 22:11) [[וַיֵּדֶא על־כנפי רוח]] (‖[[וַיִּרְכַּב עַל־כְּרוּב וַיׇּעׂף]]).
